md:
giải nghĩa từ "contagious" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Contagious (adjective)

+ Meaning: (of a disease) able to be passed from one person or animal to another through touching or close contact.

+ Vietnamese: Lây nhiễm.

+ Example sentence: The contagious disease spread quickly through the school.

+ Related words: infectious, communicable, transmissible.

* Contagious (adjective)

+ Meaning: (of an idea or feeling) able to be spread from one person to another.

+ Vietnamese: Lan truyền.

+ Example sentence: The contagious enthusiasm of the crowd was inspiring.

+ Related words: infectious, catchy, transmittable.
